reviewText: I knew this was going to be bad; but sometimes bad is fun. This is the worst thing I've ever tried to watch. The films were totally unwatchable; pictures were all out of focus and blurred. The sound was so garbled as to be unable to understand anything. Whatever you do, don't buy this. If you pay more than $.01 for this, you are paying way more that it is worth. I would have sent it back, but just trashed it instead. Seemed like to appropriate place to put it.
